import { TableBody } from '@looker/components'
import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import { excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'

<Meta component={TableBody} title="Docs/TableBody" />

# TableBody

This component is used to define the body of the table and holds the data for the table. The `<TableBody>` can have multiple `<TableRow>` tags for each row of data, and a `<TableDataCell>` tag for each cell of data to be semantically correct.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

<ArgsTable of={TableBody} exclude={excludedProps} />
